name: The Lost Island (itch) (swastiksadyal)
description:
Basically, I am a 16 Year Old Game Developer And this was one of my first project. I hope you might Like It, if you wanna give me some ideas you can do so in the reviews section and to support me in this journey you can help me on patreon link is in the game.
Now Let`s Discuss the game
Welcome to the lost island of unknown creatures and deadly habitats. find your way out of the some of the mostly unknown worlds.
You have to play as a droid sent on a mission to clear the doubts of military generals about an unknown island but wait this is not what makes your life difficult.
Yeah! you supposed it right you are all of your own and have lost connection to the headquarters and every thing else,
Remember ( yeah you need to memorize it down) this is the game of smartest and for survival, only the smartest will survive.
Want to know more?
> why don`t you just go and play the game.
